ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 568
ygData.msgSnippet: Slight spoiler space... Speaking of the hero bracer.  I traded mine a month ago for a Mistmoore Battle drum.  Now I ve gone back to try to get the bracer
ygData.messageBody:
Slight spoiler space...











Speaking of the hero bracer. I traded mine a month ago for a Mistmoore Battle drum. Now I've gone back
to try to get the bracer again. How does one get the mino hero to spawn? EQLizer says you need to kill
meldrath and his guards. But we certainly didn't do this the first time (and no one else was, that I'm
aware of). And their other information about it is obsolete as well, listing Meldrath as a 29th level
necro, and his guards as level 38. (Those number are roughly reversed now). So does anyone know the
trick? It's one of those linked spawn deals. I'm pretty sure I know where he pops...the skeleton spawn
location to the left and slightly behind the giant gear when facing the closed end of the valley. But
I've camped there for many hours now, and he hasn't popped. Also, shouts to the zone have revealed that
none of the level level folks hunting in the area have seen the hero spawn for quite some time. Any hints
will be appreciated. Next time I try, I'm gonna go for the "kill everything in sight" method. Though I'm
not capable of doing meldrath and his cronies by myself. I'd need a group of 6. (Whereas I can kill the
mino hero with just me and my level 30 cleric friend.) Thanks!

Laluni Songhammer, Level 30 Bard of E'Ci
